The idea of focusing on the process rather than just the outcome really resonates with me. And you're right that the conversation with the junior colleague might open up possibilities I haven't even considered yet. Maybe they have ideas about how to handle this that I never would have thought of.

I think I'm going to start there - have an honest conversation with them about what I witnessed and see how they want to approach it. Even if it means moving more slowly than my anger wants me to, it feels like the more ethical path.

Thank you for helping me work through this. I feel like I have a much clearer sense of how to move forward now.

<END>
